title: Atomic Media
content:
Atomic Media was started by [Matthew Bardram](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215410/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Bardram) and specializes in pixel typefaces.  
Besides the work of Bardram the foundry also represents the type designs of noted designer [Susan Kare](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215410/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Susan%20Kare) and [Miguel Hernandez](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215410/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Miguel%20Hernandez).

Link  
 [Atomic Media](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204215410/http:/atomicmedia.net/ "external link to the Atomic Media website")
author: AtomicMedia
